entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gaspésie (Parc national)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 3:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: ENE 32 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then a few flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
